name: One Thing at a Time
description:
You awaken in a hospital. It is difficult to speak. You can only make one sound at a time. Luckily, someone is here with you.

In this game, you can only choose one letter at a time and only build one word at a time. The difficulty of communication and frustration when you mess a word up are intentional.

Submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.
